name: odoo
description: Odoo RPC-based financial intelligence for accounting audits, VAT/cashflow analysis, inventory valuation, and compliant financial reporting. Read-only access to Odoo ERP.
author: ashrf

primaryCredential.description: Odoo connection credentials (URL, database, username, password/API key)

requiredEnvVars.name: ODOO_PASSWORD
requiredEnvVars.description: Odoo API key or password. For production, use an API key from Odoo Settings > Account Security.

optionalEnvVars.name: ODOO_RPC_BACKEND
optionalEnvVars.description: RPC backend: xmlrpc (legacy, default) or json2 (Odoo 19+)

install.description: Local Python installation with venv and pip packages
install.manualInstall: cd assets/autonomous-cfo && python3 -m venv venv && ./venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt

security.recommendedPractice: Create a read-only Odoo user with minimal permissions for production use
security.dataHandling: Reads financial data from Odoo. Generates reports locally. No data exfiltration. No external endpoints beyond user-specified Odoo URL.
security.credentialStorage: Environment variables loaded from .env file (assets/autonomous-cfo/.env). Password/API key never logged or displayed.
security.credentialTransmission: API key transmitted as Bearer token for JSON-RPC (Odoo 19+ standard) or in request body for XML-RPC

modelInvocation.reason: This skill handles sensitive financial data and connects to external Odoo ERP systems. It MUST be explicitly invoked by the user and CANNOT be invoked autonomously by AI models.
